statements: SELECT * FROM claim_information;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_status FROM claim_information WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_status FROM claim_information WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_details FROM claim_information WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT claimant_name, claim_details FROM claim_information WHERE claim_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM claim_information WHERE claim_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT claimant_name, claim_details FROM claim_information WHERE claim_id = 5;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_status FROM claim_information WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM claim_information WHERE claimant_name LIKE 'John%' AND claim_status = 'Rejected';
SELECT claim_id, claimant_name, claim_status FROM claim_information WHERE claim_status IN ('Pending', 'Approved') ORDER BY claimant_name;
SELECT * FROM claimants;
SELECT name, email FROM claimants WHERE claimant_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_details FROM claims WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT phone_number, name FROM claimants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT claimant_id, status FROM claims WHERE claim_details LIKE '%insurance%';
SELECT c.*, cl.claim_details FROM claimants c JOIN claims cl ON c.claimant_id = cl.claimant_id WHERE cl.status = 'pending';
SELECT cl.claim_id, cl.claim_details, c.name AS claimant_name FROM claims cl JOIN claimants c ON c.claimant_id = cl.claimant_id WHERE cl.status = 'approved';
SELECT c.name, c.email, c.phone_number, COUNT(cl.claim_id) AS total_claims FROM claimants c LEFT JOIN claims cl ON c.claimant_id = cl.claimant_id GROUP BY c.name, c.email, c.phone_number;
SELECT cl.*, c.* FROM claims cl JOIN claimants c ON c.claimant_id = cl.claimant_id WHERE cl.claim_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT c.name, c.email, cl.status FROM claimants c LEFT JOIN claims cl ON c.claimant_id = cl.claimant_id WHERE c.name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY c.name DESC, cl.status ASC;
SELECT * FROM claimants;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM claimants ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claimant_id, first_name, last_name FROM claimants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT status_id, claim_id, status, update_date FROM claim_status ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM claimants;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM claimants WHERE claimant_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT status_id, status, update_date FROM claim_status WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cs.status FROM claimants c JOIN claims cl ON c.claimant_id = cl.claimant_id JOIN claim_status cs ON cl.claim_id = cs.claim_id WHERE c.first_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Claimants;
SELECT name, email FROM Claimants WHERE claimant_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, status FROM ClaimStatus WHERE status_date <= NOW();
SELECT c.claim_id, cc.comment_text FROM Claims c JOIN ClaimComments cc ON c.claim_id = cc.claim_id
SELECT * FROM Claimants;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM Claimants WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT claim_id, status, status_date FROM ClaimStatus ORDER BY status_date DESC;

SELECT c.name, cl.claim_date, cc.comment_text FROM Claimants c JOIN Claims cl ON c.claimant_id = cl.claimant_id JOIN ClaimComments cc ON cl.claim_id = cc.claim_id WHERE cl.claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Claimants;
SELECT name, address FROM Claimants WHERE id = 1;
SELECT claimant_id, claim_status, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT status_name FROM ClaimStatus ORDER BY status_id DESC;
SELECT claim_id, MAX(updated_at) AS latest_update FROM ClaimHistory GROUP BY claim_id;
SELECT * FROM Claimants;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_id, claim_status FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT status_name, status_id FROM ClaimStatus WHERE status_id > 2;
SELECT claim_id, claimant_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_status='Pending' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ch.history_id, c.claim_id, s.status_name, ch.updated_at FROM ClaimHistory ch JOIN Claims c ON ch.claim_id = c.claim_id JOIN ClaimStatus s ON ch.status_id = s.status_id;
